title: What's Your Season 2015 Resolution?
body:
For me, I think I'll finally pick up becoming a solid jungler! It's the last role I have to master! 

What kinds of goals do you have?

replies.body: I don't get it, someone explain?{{champion:222}}
The title is what is your 2015 resolution and he said 2560x1440 meaning that is his monitor resolution for 2015
I loled

Jungle Rammus.

Every goddamned day.

> Jungle Rammus.
> 
> Every goddamned day.

Ok. {{champion:33}}

Riot, grant me the serenity to accept the trolls I cannot change,
the courage to carry games and climb in ranked,
and the wisdom to take a break every so often.
Beautiful, took the words from my mouth :,3

1) Get my boyfriend to rank

2) Prove I'm better at league than he is 

3) Get him to admit it out loud

4) Actually get better at league in the process

I think you already accomplished this one:

**â˜‘ Have the best username in *League of Legends*.**
Not being Cardboard V.
> Not being Cardboard V.
Establishing a "Cardboard" League and immediately placing myself in Cardboard V.
To kill more yordles.
{{champion:150}} YOU SICK MONSTER!

My Resolution for the 2015 Season is to actually put in the time in Ranked. I've always been a bit timid about playing a lot of Ranked, but the drive to get Gold before the end of the season (even though I didn't make it), got me to stop being intimidated by the mode, and enjoy it for what it is. That said, I will be happy if I can reach Gold at some point in 2015. Based on my performance these past couple weeks, I feel it is more a matter of time invested than anything, and I want that loading screen border for 2016!
I absolutely agree. :) That was pretty much what happened to me this season.
Sacrifice a newborn child to summon our lord and savior {{champion:17}} .
OR you can Sacrifice{{champion:17}} for a newborn child
Play more Summoner's Rift games. I mostly hang on the Howling Abyss, but I just gotta put some time on this new map. Might even try ranked some day xD
To get out of the habit of playing to win and get into the habit of playing to improve.

Playing my preffered champs without getting dunked back into silver {{champion:22}} {{champion:53}} {{champion:31}} {{champion:9}} {{champion:41}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:74}} {{champion:82}} {{champion:20}} {{champion:78}} {{champion:35}} {{champion:14}} {{champion:44}} {{champion:45}} {{champion:19}}  a few of them are fairly viable but meta picks just take massive dumps on the rest, it's really sad.

> Playing my preffered champs without getting dunked back into silver {{champion:22}} {{champion:53}} {{champion:31}} {{champion:9}} {{champion:41}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:74}} {{champion:82}} {{champion:20}} {{champion:78}} {{champion:35}} {{champion:14}} {{champion:44}} {{champion:45}} {{champion:19}}  a few of them are fairly viable but meta picks just take massive dumps on the rest, it's really sad.

Warwick's gonna be a god in the new jungle.  True damage on his Ult cause of the smite changes are gonna be ridiculous.
Fiddle seems like he'll be strong in the new jungle. You might be in luck! :)
You should learn Rumble! It looks to me like you like tanky melee AP range abilities bruisers.
to not buy any RP untill the Lore-Departement admits the wrongs of their retcon and reaches out to the Factions-Team for help in order to create the Lore this great game truly deserves.
I too have been pretty bummed about champion's bios going from interesting stories to two line sentences {{champion:15}}.
they are going to finish the stories soon
My goal is to wait patiently for either Gentleman Vel'Koz skin or Great Eye Vel'Koz skin (think Lord of the Rings).{{champion:161}}

Lets see, 

i vow to mute everybody from the start and save myself troubles. 

I vow to be a better player and get to Gold.

Well i got diamond...

* ~~get laid~~
git gud.
to keep improving to eventually make challenger

Play more ranked and actually try. I played a total of maybe 10 or 11 solo-queue games this season, with some ranked 3s with friends.

I would also like to become better at the Mid and ADC roles (I like playing in mid, but I'm not that good LOL). Would also like to work on my map awareness and mechanics, which will come from playing.

Hurry up S5!
As a {{champion:31}} main to OMNOMNOM more people

To successfully kill a wraith camp. I'll finally get that quadra!

No wait, that's just Katey's problem.

I'll get a penta ;)

> To successfully kill a wraith camp. I'll finally get that quadra!
> 
> No wait, that's just Katey's problem.
> 
> I'll get a penta ;)

ROFL.  #rekt
Getting into Platinium rank in Dominion... oh wait...
Actually play ranked
Get Diamond 1 as early in the season as possible.
Season 3 gold. Season 4 diamond. Season 5 master. the dream

To play the Kirby role since the jungle role will be replaced with the Kirby role.

I will absorb the jungle monsters and take on their powers!
Only play nidalee. I want over 90% of my ranked games to be nid games.
I was Unranked Season 2, (wasn't even 30.) Bronze Season 3, Silver Season 4, going for Gold Season 5, shouldn't be too hard since I was Silver 1 gaining +30LP a match.
My goal is to play twitch and not die 20 bajillion times, oh and learn how to jungle better.
Master my ad carry skillz! Never been able to play again since meta change
i intend to finally get good at adc. not great but...i need a few standby champions for the occasions in which i have to do it

Have fun.
I've been playing since Pre-Season 1 and this seems to be the best outlook on a new season. If you're not having fun, why continue playing?

Feed a poro a day...

at least!
To find my main champion/role.
